name: WP-CS-SERVER-INFO
author: Martin Gardner

sections.description:
See the project page for more information:
http://www.martin-gardner.co.uk/counterstrike-server-info-plugin-for-wordpress/

More info:
This plugin uses the `CStrike 1.6 Server Query class` by Markus Schanz
http://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/Server_Queries Developerwiki
sections.installation:
Install

1: Unzip the wp-cs-server-info.zip file.
2: Upload the the wp-cs-server-info folder to your wp-contents/plugins folder.

Activate

1: In your WordPress Administration, go to the Plugins page
2: Activate the plugin WP CS SERVER INFO.
4: Navigate to the Widgets page, drag the wp-cs-server-info to the sidebar thats in use.
5: Enter the Name, Server IP & Port number, Click save.
6: visit your homepage (or were the sidebar will be loaded)and you should see the server info.

If you find any bugs or have any ideas, please mail me.
sections.faq:
Q: The front end webpage dosnt load properly after widget was added=
A: This could be that your host dosnt allow connections from their network of servers to the gameserver, so
all communications to and from the server wont happen, “Check Back soon for more Updates!”
sections.changelog:
1.0 beta: Added Options to widget to show different server values
0.9 beta: Added widget control panel.
0.8 beta: Added more map images.
0.7 beta: Tested up to wp 2.7.
0.6 beta: Added strip_tags, stripslashes to user input.
0.5 beta: Created seperate php pages for Functions, Widget, Widget_control.
0.4 beta: Tidy up code on main plugin php file.
0.3 beta: Removed Admin Options page for future releases.
0.2 beta: Fixed Cstrike Class Include with Absolute paths
0.1 beta: Created Admin Options Page for adding servers.

short_description: This plugin allows connection to a Counterstrike/Source Server
